content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STREFC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STREFN
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0550
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When --STREFC is populated, --STREFN should also be populated.
Outcome:
  Message: --STREFN is null when --STREFC is populated.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0550
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Reference value for continuous or numeric results
                  or findings in standard format or in standard units. --STREFN uses
                  the same units as --STRESN, if applicable.
                Document: SDTM v2.0
                Item: --STREFN
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: When --STREFC is populated, --STREFN should also be populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Reference value for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format or in standard units. --STREFN uses the same units as --STRESN, if applicable.
